snippet: An Algerian military raid on a gas facility where Islamist militants were holding dozens of hostages, freed an Irish citizen on Thursday, but at least one Briton was killed.
abstract: An Algerian military raid on a gas facility where Islamist militants were holding dozens of hostages, freed an Irish citizen on Thursday, but at least one Briton was killed.

byline.original: By CHRISTINE HAUSER and ROBERT MACKEY

headline.main: Irish Hostage Is 'Safe and Free' in Algeria, but Britons Are Told to Brace for Bad News
